CREATE TABLE citation ( doi text NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, original_download_doi text, citation text, title text, target text, created timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), created_by text NOT NULL, modified timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT now(), modified_by text NOT NUll );
CREATE TABLE dataset_citation ( dataset_key_or_doi text NOT NULL, citation_doi text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (dataset_key_or_doi, citation_doi) );
